item.description:
Camping, Bonfire, Clambake/Lobster Fest in Hancock NH June 22nd &23rd Join us for one or both nights. Camping at Seven Maples Campground (www.sevenmaples.com ) Friday and Saturday night. This is a great event for kids. There are many activities for them and we have several kids (under age 10) coming. Campground has swimming pool, rec. hall, fishing, playground, horseshoe pit, volleyball, basketball, shuffle board. Campground has swimming pool, rec. hall, fishing, playground, horseshoe pit, volleyball, basketball, shuffle board. Canoe and Kayak rentals available for paddling on Moose Brook. Hiking (including Mt Monadnock)and biking trails nearby. The campground has a clambake and lobster fest on Saturday night (cost approx $24) steak is also available(cost approx $20) if you’re not a seafood lover. If you dont want to do the clambake, bring some food to share and we will organize a potluck for Sat. night.

We will have access to a large fire ring for bonfires, be prepared to chip in $ for wood. Camp sites have electric and water for $33/night. This is a kid and dog** friendly event. **Dogs must be registered with the campground and have proof of vaccinations.

Call Seven Maples to make your reservation 603-525-3321 - Ask for the “Meetup” party in sites S1-S20. You must make reservations for the Clambake or Steak dinner no later than Saturday June 16th. Contact your host: Joan at 603-305-7114 if you have any questions.
item.name: Camping, Bonfire, Clambake/Lobster Fest
